title: [Control systems] Schneider Electric security advisory (AV25-752)
description: On November 11, 2025, Schneider Electric published advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: EcoStruxure Machine SCADA Expert  versions prior to 2023.1 Patch 1
Pro-face BLUE Open Studio  versions prior to 2023.1 Patch 1
PowerChute Serial Shutdown  versions v1.3 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
